item.title: Image Processing Using Tensorflow - Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)
item.author: Author
item.description: Digital image processing is the use of a digital computer to process digital images through an algorithm. As a subcategory or field of digital signal processing, digital image processing has many advantages over analog image processing.

item.title: Spring Boot Web Socket Chat Bot
item.author: Author
item.description: Build real time chat with bot using spring boot web socket and contextual chat bot python.

item.title: Contextual Chat Bot using NLP
item.author: Author
item.description: Build contextual chat bot with python and tensorflow library to talking about riddles. We will build a model for a puzzle conversation.

item.title: Research Reference Bot
item.author: Author
item.description: This project will create search engine bot on telegram using TF IDF and Cosine Similarity
